response.overview: Not only will the 2000 season be remembered for the last appearance of the Super Touring cars but also as a storming year for Team Ford Mondeo, culminating in a Championship-winning drive by Alain Menu. Here the ferocious track action at every round is recalled in fantastic film footage, captured from every conceivable angle including thrilling close-ups in and on the cars. BBC commentators Charlie Cox and John Watson deliver the detailed off-track analysis and many fascinating insights into the teams, drivers and pit crews.
response.title: BTCC 2000 Review
